Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules

Class Rules<T extends GameOperationState,​S extends Rules<T,​S>>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules.Rules<T,​S>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the supported GameOperationState in order to execute the rules
S - The type of the supported Rules that can be merged with
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicableRules<T,​S>, ExpandableRules<T,​S>, RulesConvertible<T,​S>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BRules, MRules
public abstract class Rules<T extends GameOperationState,​S extends Rules<T,​S>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicableRules<T,​S>, ExpandableRules<T,​S>
Brief Represents the game rules handler. It uses a GameOperationState to execute the different rules it may store. It can be merged with other supported Rules. The rules stored within must be both applicable and expandable
See Also:
GameOperationState
